column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the Reuben & a side of mac and cheese. The sandwiches are a bit pricey
column2: considering no sides come with it. I would've liked to see you get french fries at least for a $14 sandwich. They are enormous tho
column3: and one half of it went home for my dinner. Mac and cheese was wonderful!! Ordered it for the kids
column4: but us adults ate it up too quick ;)
